job.title: Machine Learning/ML Engineer
job.description: Machine Learning/ML Engineer Cool Minds LLC Location: Austin, TX (Remote until Covid) and Candidates who can work in PST will be given the preference Job Requirements: 5+ years of industry experience or a PhD and in addition, minimum 2 years industry experience in applied Machine learning. Strong coding skills in Python/Java/Scala or equivalent Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow and popular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferred Solid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in production Experience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plus Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plus Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plus Industry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a bigplus.
